name: @console/dynamic-plugin-sdk
description: Tools and APIs for building OpenShift Console dynamic plugins

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn validate && yarn compile && yarn generate
scripts.compile: for ext in '' '-internal' '-webpack' ; do ./node_modules/.bin/tsc -p tsconfig${ext}.json || exit $? ; done
scripts.generate: yarn generate-schema && yarn generate-doc && yarn generate-pkg-assets
